title: Paragon Disk Wiper 12 Compact 10.1.19.16299 Retail Incl Key - Ku

Paragon Disk Wiper 12 Compact 10.1.19.16299 Retail Incl Key - KurdTM



Paragon Disk Wiper is a unique solution for protecting your personal identity or company trade secrets. Did you know that when you format an existing hard drive, your operating system doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t erase all the data? It only deletes the information about where the files are located on the drive. This means that your confidential information still resides on your hard drive and can be easily recovered with data recovery software. The only way to erase data completely is with a disk wiping solution. Make sure nobody recovers your deleted information and prevent identity theft with Paragon Disk Wiper. Simply erasing or reformatting your hard disk drive may not be enough to prevent financial records, passwords and other confidential documents from falling into the wrong hands.
Safeguard your personal identity or company trade secrets with Paragon Disk Wiper Professional! Disk Wiper Professional provides skilled resources and comprehensive wiping tools to help you with this important but often overlooked security risk!
Disk Wiper Professional allows you to:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Completely and easily erase all live data so as it cannot be recovered with any existing technology.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly and efficiently sanitize the hard disks in order to protect valuable business information and also because there is, in the most countries, a legal obligation to do so.
